thoughts.text: The Node.js tar file has been successfully extracted. Now, I need to add Node.js to the PATH so that it can be used from any location in the terminal.
thoughts.reasoning: Adding Node.js to the PATH makes it easier to use. It allows me to run Node.js commands from any location in the terminal without having to specify the full path to the Node.js binaries.
